dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT QOOFV.OD_OB_FAI_ID AS FAI_ID , QOOFV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM AS PROJECT , QOOFV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT AS SOURCING_AGENT , QOOFSV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM AS SUB_PROJECT , QOOFSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME AS DEPARTMENT , QOOFSV.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC AS VPN , QOOFSV.OD_OB_SKU AS SKU , QOOFSV.OD_PB_ITEM_DESC AS SKU_DESCRIPTION , QOOFSV.OD_PB_CAP_YN AS SKU_CAP , QOOFSV.OD_OB_REF_CAPID AS SKU_CAPID , QOOFV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME AS VENDOR_NAME , QOOFV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME AS FACTORY_NAME , QOOFV.OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS AS FACTORY_ADRESS , QOOFV.OD_PB_FACTORY_CONTACT AS FACTORY_CONTACT , QOOFV.OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL AS FACTORY_EMAIL , QOOFV.OD_SC_REGION AS REGION , QOOFV.OD_PB_DATE_PROPOSED_PRODUCTION AS MASS_PRODUCTION_START_DATE , QOOFV.OD_SC_SCHEDULED_DATE AS PLANNED_FAI_DATE , QOOFV.OD_SC_INSPECTION_DATE AS ACTUAL_FAI_DATE , QOOFV.OD_PB_ATTACHMENT AS ATTACHMENT , QOOFV.OD_OB_AUDIT_RESULT AS OVERALL_AUDIT , QOOFV.OD_OB_GENERAL_RESULT AS GENERAL , QOOFV.OD_OB_PROCESS_INSP_RESULT AS PROCESS_INSPECTION , QOOFV.OD_OB_PROD_INSP_RESULT AS PRODUCT_INSPECTION , QOOFV.OD_OB_PKG_INSP_RESULT AS PACKAGING_INSPECTION , QOOFV.OD_OB_TESTING_INSP_RESULT AS TESTING_INSPECTION , QOOFV.OD_OB_INSP_PROTOCOL_RESULT AS INSPECTION_PROTOCOL_VERIF , QOOFV.OD_PB_CAP_YN AS CAP , QOOFV.OD_OB_REF_CAPID AS CAPID , QOOFV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME AS SUBMITTER , QOOFV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL AS APPROVER , QOOFV.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS AS APPROVAL_STATUS , QOOFV.OD_PB_COMMENTS AS COMMENTS FROM Q_OD_OB_FAI_V QOOFV , Q_OD_OB_FAI_SKU_V QOOFSV WHERE QOOFV.OD_OB_FAI_ID = QOOFSV.OD_OB_REF_REC_ID(+) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_FAI_ID,'X') = NVL(:P_FAI_ID, NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_FAI_ID,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM,'X') = NVL(:P_PROJECT, NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X') = NVL(:P_SOURCING_AGENT, NVL(QOOFV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT, NVL(QOOFSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFSV.OD_OB_SKU,1) = NVL(:P_SKU, NVL(QOOFSV.OD_OB_SKU,1) ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME, NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME, NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_AUDIT_RESULT,'X') = NVL(:P_OVERALL_AUDIT_GRADE, NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_AUDIT_RESULT, 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_CAP_YN,'X') = NVL(:P_CAP, NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_CAP_YN,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_REF_CAPID,'X') = NVL(:P_CAPID, NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_REF_CAPID,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER, NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER, NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVAL_STATUS, NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X') ) ORDER BY QOOFV.OD_OB_FAI_ID ,QOOFSV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM
